title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
description: Arthur Dent's unlucky day gets worse when his house is demolished, the planet Earth is destroyed, and he is whisked through space.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A novel of manners, following the emotional development of Elizabeth Bennet, who learns the repercussions of hasty judgments.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Secret History
author: Donna Tartt
description: A group of classics students at a New England college fall into a world of morally dubious choices.
